property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box

property.name: Text Box
property.value: You may only play one copy of Advanced Intelligence per battle. Reaction: After a Recon Strategy's action resolves: Draw one card for each action from a Recon Strategy you have taken this battle.

Destroy the duel's loser. Give the duel's winner two +1F Revenge tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target an enemy Personality whose unit's total Gold cost is 10 or lower: He defects. Take control of him (he joins your army). Dishonor him. Destroy any of his Followers whose Honor Requirement he now fails to meet. Give control of him to his owner before the turn ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Until the turn ends, Rings will not enter play if their owner has already put a Ring into play this turn. Limited: Target an Event in another player's discard pile: End all of its ongoing effects. Shuffle it into its owner's deck.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, straighten a Personality. Battle/Open: Choose your performing Yojimbo: The next time (this turn) another player's action would target one of your Personalities, it targets the Yojimbo instead, if legal. You may take an additional action.

property.name: Text Box

property.value: KIHO Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: After the next time (this turn) an action targets him, you may choose either to negate its effects on your Monk, or to bow the unit of one Personality that performed it after the action resolves. You may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Commander and target a Follower in your hand or discard pile: Attach it to him, ignoring all costs. Destroy it before this battle resolves. You may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Open: Target a Personality: After the next time this turn he is assigned to attack, dishonor him and his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor. Open: Each of your provinces has +2 strength for each dishonorable Personality attacking it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy Personality: Bow him. Give this battlefield's province a strength bonus equal to your Courtier's Chi.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target one or two Personalities: Dishonor them. Draw an additional card during your next End Phase.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Personality and a Battle Strategy in another player's discard pile: Its abilities may be used an additional time this turn. Your Personality copies a keyword on an enemy Personality. You may take an additional action to play the Strategy for one of its actions. After it resolves, remove it from the game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KIHO Open: Choose your performing unbowed Henshin and target a Personality: Permanently give him, or remove from him, Cavalry, Naval, or Tactician.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DARK VIRTUE • CONTROL Limited: Choose your performing Samurai and target another player's Personality: Neither Personality may be assigned to battlefields.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja: Ranged 4 Attack. The next time this battle the enemy leader takes a Battle action, if it can legally target the Ninja, it must target him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Choose your performing Tactician and target your Personality: He may assign even if bowed. Give him Elite.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Open: Choose your performing Personality: Take the Imperial Favor. Battle/Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target your unit: Straighten it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: NINJA Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality: He infiltrates the enemy ranks. Permanently give him the trait, "After a Straighten Phase begins: Choose your bowed non-Ninja Personality. Negate his straightening this phase." Give control of him to another player.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Target another player's Personality: Permanently give him Brash.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Bow your performing Scout and target a face-up Scout Personality in your province: Bring the target into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs. If you have Reconnaissance, you may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: The next time this battle another player's Battle action would target one of your cards, it targets your performer, if legal. If he has 7 or more base Force, you may take an additional Battle action (after this action ends).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: If it is not your turn and the active player controls any Personalities, choose your performing unbowed Spirit: After the next Dynasty Phase begins, if it was opposed this turn, gain 2 Honor, and if no units were assigned to attack this turn, gain 3 Honor if your Honor is lower than each other player's.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier: After this action ends (and this card is in your discard pile), gain 1 Honor for each card titled Sharing Gossip in all players' discard piles.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target your defending Personality: Give him and each of his Followers +3F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TERRAIN Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there. Reaction: If this card is in play, when another player's action would target one of your Personalities, choose your performing Personality: The action targets him instead, if legal.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KATA Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata in play. Battle: If this card is in play, choose your performing Personality: Move him home. If he moved, straighten his unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Ranged 1 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, draw a card; if it destroyed a Follower, you may take an additional Battle action.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Limited: Choose your performing unbowed honorable Personality and target a Personality with lower base Personal Honor: Dishonor or rehonor the target.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each Follower in the target's unit.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KIHO As a Focus Effect: You may discard your Personality in this duel (ending the duel without resolution). Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Monk at any location and bow your target Ring: Give the current battlefield's province +3 or -3 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Reaction: Before a Proclaim action resolves: Negate its effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Kensai: You may take two additional Battle actions from cards in his unit. Other actions will not give you new additional Battle actions this battle.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 4 Attack. Battle: If this card is in your discard pile, bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 4 Attack. Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Target a Ring which did not last enter play by its own text: This is not true enlightenment. Permanently remove its abilities. Limited: Target one or more cards in your provinces: Discard them. Refill the provinces face-up from the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: POLITICAL Open: Each player may only take two more non-Reaction actions this phase. Limited: Pay 2 Gold: Draw a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality with lower Chi: Move him home.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: BUSHIDO VIRTUE • COMPASSION Open: If it is not your turn, choose another player: You come across some starving peasants in need. You, then the player, each pay zero or more Gold. Whoever paid more Gold gains Honor equal to the difference between the two amounts paid, or 4, whichever is less.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TERRAIN Before an action's effect destroys a card in a unit: Negate the destruction. Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Target your Tattooed Personality: Give him a +1F Fire token. Battle: Destroy a Fire token on your performing Personality: Ranged 5 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Limited: Create an additional Attack Phase, during which battle resolution does not destroy defending armies or provinces and does not bow your Mantis Clan Magistrates or your attachments. After it ends, if you won any of its battles (even against no units at resolution), you may target a Personality or Holding, bow it, and negate its straightening until after your next Straighten Phase ends.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: You do not lose Honor from Ninja cards you own. While another player's Battle action would target your Ninja: He is a master of the art of Ninjutsu. Once per battle, you may choose your Ninja at the same location. If you did, the action targets it instead, if legal.
